gain.docs:
**int**: The gain of the ambient light sensor. One of 1, 3, 6, 9, 18. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9306.html#configuration-variables)*

bit_width.docs:
**int**: The bit width/resolution of the ambient light sensor. One of:
  * `20` takes 400ms
  
  * `19` takes 200ms
  
  * `18` takes 100ms (`default`)
  
  * `17` takes 50ms
  
  * `16` takes 25ms
  
  * `13` takes 3.125ms
  
  

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9306.html#configuration-variables)*

measurement_rate.docs:
**int**: The measurement rate of the ambient light sensor in milliseconds. One of:
  * `25`
  
  * `50`
  
  * `100` (`default`);
  
  * `200`
  
  * `500`
  
  * `1000`
  
  

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9306.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval at which the sensor reading will be updated. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9306.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Should be `0x52` according to datasheet (“Contact factory for other addressing options”).

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9306.html#configuration-variables)*
